languages.text: Миры протектората фон Валанциус терзают давние враги Человечества — ксеносы, устраивающие стремительные налеты на колонии и торговые суда. Рекомендуется пресечь дальнейшее разграбление владений и нанести ответный удар.

The worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are being terrorised by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counter-attack.
languages.original_text: Миры протектората фон Валанциус терзают давние враги Человечества — ксеносы, устраивающие стремительные налеты на колонии и торговые суда. Рекомендуется пресечь дальнейшее разграбление владений и нанести ответный удар.

traits.locale_text: The worlds of the von Valancius trade empire are being terrorized by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counterattack.

The worlds of the von Valancius trade empire are being terrorized by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counterattack.

The worlds of the von Valancius trade empire are being terrorized by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counterattack.

The worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are being terrorised by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counterattack.

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的各个世界正在遭到人类之敌的袭击，异形正在不断侵扰殖民地与贸易舰船。行商浪人必须阻止异形进一步掠夺冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的财富，吹响反击的号角。
languages.original_text: The worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are being terrorised by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counter-attack.

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的各个世界正在遭到人类之敌的袭击，异形正在不断侵扰殖民地与贸易舰船。行商浪人必须阻止异形进一步掠夺冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的财富，吹响反击的号角。

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の惑星は、人類の敵、すなわち植民地や貿易船を奇襲する異種族に脅かされている。自由開拓者は王朝の拠点がこれ以上略奪されるのを防ぎ、反撃を開始しなければなりません。
languages.original_text: The worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are being terrorised by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counter-attack.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の惑星は、人類の敵、すなわち植民地や貿易船を奇襲する異種族に脅かされている。自由開拓者は王朝の拠点がこれ以上略奪されるのを防ぎ、反撃を開始しなければなりません。

languages.text: Los mundos del protectorado von Valancius sufren el asedio constante de los enemigos de la Humanidad: los xenos realizan ataques relámpago contra las colonias y las naves comerciales. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe evitar futuros saqueos contra la dinastía con un contraataque.
languages.original_text: The worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are being terrorised by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counter-attack.

traits.locale_text: Los mundos del protectorado von Valancius sufren el asedio constante de los enemigos de la Humanidad: los xenos realizan ataques relámpago contra las colonias y las naves comerciales. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe evitar futuros saqueos contra la dinastía con un contraataque.

languages.text: Die Welten des Valancius-Protektorats werden von Feinden der Menschheit terrorisiert ... Xenos, die schnelle Attacken auf Kolonien und Handelsschiffe ausführen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss weitere Plünderungen der Besitztümer der Dynastie unterbinden und zum Gegenangriff übergehen.
languages.original_text: The worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are being terrorised by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counter-attack.

traits.locale_text: Die Welten des Valancius-Protektorats werden von Feinden der Menschheit terrorisiert ... Xenos, die schnelle Attacken auf Kolonien und Handelsschiffe ausführen. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss weitere Plünderungen der Besitztümer der Dynastie unterbinden und zum Gegenangriff übergehen.

languages.text: Les mondes du protectorat von Valancius sont harcelés par les ennemis de l'humanité : les xénos mènent des attaques éclair sur des colonies et des vaisseaux de commerce. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit prévenir tout autre pillage des propriétés de la dynastie et lancer une contre-offensive.
languages.original_text: The worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are being terrorised by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counter-attack.

traits.locale_text: Les mondes du protectorat von Valancius sont harcelés par les ennemis de l'humanité : les xénos mènent des attaques éclair sur des colonies et des vaisseaux de commerce. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit prévenir tout autre pillage des propriétés de la dynastie et lancer une contre-offensive.

languages.text: Von Valancius protektorasındaki dünyalar, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının terör saldırılarının hedefi konumunda. Zenolar, sürekli olarak kolonilere ve ticaret gemilerine saldırıyor. Hür Tacir, hanedanlık topraklarının daha fazla yağmalanmasının önüne geçip karşı saldırı düzenlemeli.
languages.original_text: The worlds of the von Valancius protectorate are being terrorised by enemies of Humanity — xenos carrying out rapid strikes on colonies and trading vessels. The Rogue Trader must prevent any further plundering of the dynasty's holdings and launch a counter-attack.

traits.locale_text: Von Valancius protektorasına ait dünyalar, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının terör saldırılarının hedefi konumunda. Zenolar, kolonilere ve ticaret gemilerine sürekli olarak saldırılar düzenliyor. Hür Tacir, hanedanlığın himayesindeki varlıkların daha fazla yağmalanmasının önüne geçmeli ve bir karşı saldırı düzenlemeli.
